entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to periods of rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
